content: Dig a hole, cover it with dirt, and count — one, two, three, four, five...{短暂停} {A豆豆眼}Wait, rawr? Where did I bury it again?
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-单一闲聊-有条件-NPC自身-手持物-铲子-1012巴彦_单一闲聊

content: Why is it that when I dig a hole, bury some Goldflux Ore, {A疑惑}and come back a few days later, I find iron ore instead?
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-单一闲聊-有条件-NPC自身-手持物-铲子-1012巴彦_单一闲聊
